thought: To solve this task I need to craft honey_block. Honey_block requires placing 4 honey_bottle in a square formation in the crafting table, therefore I will first need to move the honey_bottle from slot 38 into the crafting grid.
Ok
act: move from slot 38 to slot 1 with quantity 1
